name: TheAtlantic
text: "For people across a broad ideological terrain, Trumpism will be less an attractive political philosophy than a term of abuse," @PeterBeinart writes. "The best precedent is McCarthyism, which has become a synonym for hysterical intolerance." https://t.co/3tCUHyGudt

name: TheAtlantic
text: "I'm going to be the kind of congressperson where I’m going to be at rallies with the people, fighting for justice and being present," Jamaal Bowman, whom the Associated Press has said defeated incumbent Democrat Eliot Engel, told @IsaacDovere: https://t.co/4y06Hu2gfw

name: TheAtlantic
text: The grim effects of Trump’s wayward whims have turned Americans into a nation of armchair psychologists, struggling to understand the workings of one particular psyche, @megangarber writes: https://t.co/kjtvKWibC5
